agaric: A type of mushroom with a cap and stem.
gyromitra: A type of mushroom known for its unusual shape.
earth star fungus: A type of fungus that resembles a star.
hen of the woods mushroom: A type of mushroom that grows in clusters and looks like feathers.
bolete: A type of mushroom with a thick stem and sponge-like pores.
corn cob: The central part of an ear of corn.
